price: Allah: None has the right to be worshiped except Him, the Ever-Living, the All-Sustaining.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُ
